attributes.comment:
We would like to respectfully request that the USCIS fees for international
adoptions not be raised. We are currently in the process of adopting a baby girl
from China and are "like many" on a very tight budget. So many other things
pertaining to adoption have increased as well and it has become a very expensive
process. We have no regrets for starting the process but can only hope that
someone will hear our voice and not continue with the rate increases at this time.
Thank you very much for taking the time to hear our comments.

Sincerely,
Ken & Sharon Small
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Ken and Sharon Small
